thread.title: After Meeting with Trump, Intel CEO Makes Big League Jobs Announcement
thread.title_full: After Meeting with Trump, Intel CEO Makes Big League Jobs Announcement

author: John S. Roberts
title: After Meeting with Trump, Intel CEO Makes Big League Jobs Announcement
text:
06:21pm February 8, 2017   
After meeting with President Donald Trump earlier today, the CEO of Intel made a $7 billion commitment to the United States economy. 
Coming soon to Chandler, AZ, 3,000 new jobs. 
Correction: high-wage jobs. 
Now that‚Äôs big league ! 
Check it‚Ä¶ 
From BuzzFeed : 
Intel CEO Brian Krzanich visited President Trump at the White House Wednesday and announced a $7 billion investment in a semiconductor factor in Chandler, Arizona that he claims will employ 3,000 high-wage workers at the height of production. Thank you Brian Krzanich, CEO of @Intel . A great investment ($7 BILLION) in American INNOVATION and JOBS! #AmericaFirst üá∫üá∏ pic.twitter.com/76lAiSSQ1l 
‚Äî Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 8, 2017 
Dubbed Fab 42, Intel‚Äôs Chandler factory will build some of ‚Äúthe most advanced 7-nanometer semiconductor chips on the planet,‚Äù Krzanich said, adding that the company‚Äôs investment in the factory is also an investment in American manufacturing. Intel ‚Äî which announced layoffs of some 12,000 employees in 2016 ‚Äî said the facility will create ‚Äúapproximately 3,000 high-tech, high-wage jobs‚Äù and ‚Äúmore than 10,000 total long-term jobs in Arizona.‚Äù 
‚ÄúWe‚Äôre very happy and I can tell you the people of Arizona are very happy,‚Äù President Trump said of Intel‚Äôs factory announcement. 
Trump told us he would make the America great again. 
He told us he‚Äôd bring back jobs, push back ISIS, and promised to always put the United States first. 
So far, he has exceeded expectiations ‚Äì especially among those who were timid heading into the voting booth on election day. 
Well done, Mr. President! 
Keep up the good work. LIKE this article?
